title: 4 people hospitalized with gunshot wounds after shooting in Albion
content:
UPDATE: Fight leads to gunfire in Albion apartment complex, 4 hospitalized
ALBION, MI -- Four people were hospitalized with gunshot wounds Thursday night following a shooting in Albion.
The Albion Department of Public Safety responded to the 500 block of West Broadwell Street about 10:30 p.m. Thursday, Sept. 17, according to a news release issued by the department.
Four people were transported to local hospitals with gunshots wounds, while their conditions were unknown as of Thursday night, the release said.
Currently, police do not have any suspect information as detectives follow up on leads.
Anyone with any information regarding the shooting is asked to contact Silent Observer at 517-629-2700.
Ryan Shek is a reporter for the Jackson Citizen Patriot and MLive.com. Contact him at rshek@mlive.com.
